name: Sasa
overview: SASA the robot is on his mission to destroy some Monsters in the Astro-Ring. Before he can join the battlefield, he's got to prepare well. Energy determines the fate of this battle. Even getting sufficient energy is a tough task. SASA has to destroy the power generators to scatter energy bottles into the sea. Unfortunately, these bottles are kept by octopi. SASA should kill them and seize these energy bottles. Armed with enough energy bottles, SASA marches to the Astro-Ring and launches his attack against the Monsters.
